00024 enum ParserState { UNKNOWN, STARTING_DOCUMENT, DIRECTIVE, 
00025     ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG, ELEMENT_CONTENT, ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT, ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG,
00026     STARTING_COMMENT, IN_COMMENT, ENDING_COMMENT, ONE_LINE_COMMENT,

00052 void ShowStack( vector<string> vec ) {
00053   cout << "*** Vector contains: " ;
00054   ostream_iterator<string> output( cout, " " ) ;  // see Deitel CPPHTP/8e p. 868 line 16
00055   copy( vec.begin(), vec.end(), output ) ;        // see Deitel CPPHTP/8e p. 869 line 56
00056   cout << endl ;
00057 }

00064 void ShowElementStack() {
00065   cout << "*** Element stack contains: " ;
00066   for ( vector<Element*>::iterator it = vecElementStack.begin() ; 
00067         it != vecElementStack.end() ; it++ ) {
00068     cout << (*it)->getStrTagName() << " " ;
00069   }
00070   cout << endl ;
00071 }

00073 
00080 string trim( string& str ) {
00081   // cout << "Trimming |" << str << "|" << endl ;
00082   while ( str[0] == ' ' || str[0] == '\t' ) {
00083     str.erase( str.begin() ) ;  // must use an iterator
00084   } 
00085   while ( str[str.length()-1] == ' ' || str[str.length()-1] == '\t' ) {
00086     str.erase( str.end()-1 ) ;  // must use an iterator
00087   } 
00088   return str ;
00089 }

00096 void ShowState( ParserState ps ) {
00097   cout << "ParserState = " ;
00098   switch ( ps ) {
00099     case UNKNOWN : cout << "UNKNOWN" ; break ;
00100     case STARTING_DOCUMENT : cout << "STARTING_DOCUMENT" ; break ;
00101     case DIRECTIVE : cout << "DIRECTIVE" ; break ;
00102     case ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG : cout << "ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG" ; break ;
00103     case ELEMENT_CONTENT : cout << "ELEMENT_CONTENT" ; break ; 
00104     case ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT : cout << "ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT" ; break ;
00105     case ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG : cout << "ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG" ; break ;
00106     case STARTING_COMMENT : cout << "STARTING_COMMENT" ; break ;
00107     case IN_COMMENT : cout << "IN_COMMENT" ; break ;
00108     case ENDING_COMMENT : cout << "ENDING_COMMENT" ; break ;
00109     case ONE_LINE_COMMENT : cout << "ONE_LINE_COMMENT" ; break ;
00110     case ERROR : cout << "ERROR" ; break ;
00111     default : cout << "UNKNOWN" ; break ;
00112   }
00113   cout << endl ;
00114 }

00121 string GetParserState( ParserState ps ) {
00122   switch ( ps ) {
00123     case UNKNOWN : return "UNKNOWN" ; break ;
00124     case STARTING_DOCUMENT : return "STARTING_DOCUMENT" ; break ;
00125     case DIRECTIVE : return "DIRECTIVE" ; break ;
00126     case ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG : return "ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG" ; break ;
00127     case ELEMENT_CONTENT : return "ELEMENT_CONTENT" ; break ; 
00128     case ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT : return "ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT" ; break ;
00129     case ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG : return "ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG" ; break ;
00130     case STARTING_COMMENT : return "STARTING_COMMENT" ; break ;
00131     case IN_COMMENT : return "IN_COMMENT" ; break ;
00132     case ENDING_COMMENT : return "ENDING_COMMENT" ; break ;
00133     case ONE_LINE_COMMENT : return "ONE_LINE_COMMENT" ; break ;
00134     case ERROR : return "ERROR" ; break ;
00135     default : return "UNKNOWN" ; break ;
00136   }
00137 }

00139 
00161 ParserState GetXMLData( string strLine, string& strElementName, string& strContent, 
00162     int nStartPos, int& nEndPos, ParserState currentState ) {
00163   strContent = "" ;       // content of an element
00164   strElementName = "" ;   // name of element found
00165   nStartPos =             // position of an opening < character
00166       strLine.find( "<", nStartPos ) ;
00167   nEndPos =               // position of the corresponding closing > character
00168       strLine.find( ">", nStartPos ) ;    
00169   
00170 //  // for debugging
00171 //  if ( nStartPos != string::npos ) {
00172 //    cout << "|" << strLine.substr( nStartPos, 4 ) << "|" << endl ;
00173 //  }
00174   
00175   // closing > not found (string::npos is returned if the search string is not found)
00176   if ( nEndPos == string::npos ) {
00177     if ( currentState == STARTING_COMMENT || currentState == IN_COMMENT ) {
00178       strContent = strLine ;
00179       return IN_COMMENT ;
00180     } else if ( strLine.substr( nStartPos, 4 ).compare( "<!--" ) == 0 ) {
00181       return STARTING_COMMENT ;
00182     } else {
00183       strContent = strLine ;
00184       trim( strContent ) ;
00185       return UNKNOWN ;
00186     }
00187   
00188   // opening < not found
00189   } else if ( nStartPos == string::npos && nEndPos > 1 && 
00190               strLine.substr( nEndPos-2, 3 ).compare( "-->" ) == 0 ) {
00191     return ENDING_COMMENT ;
00192     
00193   // ? found after opening <, indicating a directive
00194   } else if ( strLine[nStartPos+1] == '?' ) {
00195     strContent = strLine.substr( nStartPos+2, ( nEndPos - nStartPos - 3 ) ) ;
00196     return DIRECTIVE ;
00197 
00198   // !-- found after opening <, indicating a comment
00199   } else if ( strLine.substr( nStartPos, 4 ).compare( "<!--" ) == 0 ) {
00200     strContent = strLine.substr( nStartPos+4, nEndPos - nStartPos - 6 ) ;
00201     trim( strContent ) ;
00202     return ONE_LINE_COMMENT ;
00203 
00204   // found element closing tag
00205   } else if ( strLine[nStartPos+1] == '/' ) {
00206     strElementName = strLine.substr( nStartPos+2, ( nEndPos - nStartPos - 2 ) ) ;
00207     
00208     // element name should match last entry pushed onto stack
00209     if ( strElementName.compare( vecElementNames.back() ) == 0 ) {
00210       vecElementNames.pop_back() ;
00211       return ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG ;
00212     } else {
00213       strContent = "XML file is not well-formed.  Read element closing tag " + 
00214           strElementName + ", but last element pushed onto stack was " + 
00215           vecElementNames.back() + "." ;
00216       return ERROR ;
00217     }
00218 
00219   // found element opening tag
00220   } else {
00221     strElementName = strLine.substr( nStartPos+1, ( nEndPos - nStartPos - 1 ) ) ;
00222     
00223     // ignore any attributes found
00224     int posSpace = strElementName.find( " ", 0 ) ;
00225     if ( posSpace != string::npos ) {
00226       strElementName = strElementName.substr( 0, posSpace ) ;
00227     }
00228   
00229     // search for closing element tag on the same line
00230     int posClosingTag = strLine.find( "</" + strElementName + ">", nEndPos + 1 ) ;
00231     
00232     // closing tag found
00233     if ( posClosingTag != string::npos ) {
00234       strContent = strLine.substr( nEndPos + 1, posClosingTag - nEndPos - 1 ) ;
00235       trim( strContent ) ;
00236       return ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT ;
00237     
00238     // search for self-closing tag
00239     } else {
00240       posClosingTag = strLine.find( "/>", nStartPos + 1 ) ;
00241       
00242       if ( posClosingTag != string::npos ) {
00243         strContent = "" ;
00244         return ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT ;
00245     
00246       // closing tag not found
00247       } else {
00248         // push element name onto vector stack
00249         vecElementNames.push_back( strElementName ) ;
00250         return ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG ;
00251       }
00252     } 
00253   }
00254   
00255   // the line could not be interpreted
00256   return UNKNOWN ;
00257 }

00269 int GetXMLData( string strFileName ) {
00270   // convert the string type to a standard C string for use in the infile function
00271   char* pcharFileName = new char [strFileName.size() + 1] ;
00272   strcpy( pcharFileName, strFileName.c_str() ) ;
00273   
00274   // open the input file
00275   ifstream infile( pcharFileName ) ;
00276 
00277   char pLine[256] ;         // line read from the file, note that a char* (not a 
00278                             //    string) is required by the getline method
00279   string strLine ;          // string version of the line read (pLine) so that
00280                             //    we can work with the data as an STL type
00281   string strContent ;       // name of element specified on line
00282   string strElementName ;   // name of element specified on line
00283   int nParsePos ;           // position at which parsing ended
00284   ParserState currentState = STARTING_DOCUMENT ;
00285                             // parser state before reading next line
00286   ParserState newState ;    // type of element read by the parser
00287   int nLine = 0 ;           // line counter
00288   Element* ptrElemCurrent = NULL ;   
00289                             // pointer to the current element being processed
00290   
00291   // process file
00292   while ( infile.getline( pLine, 256 ) != NULL ) {
00293     strLine = pLine ;   // convert char* to string
00294     cout << "\n" << ++nLine << ": " << trim( strLine ) << endl 
00295          << "*** Current Parser State = " << GetParserState( currentState ) << endl
00296          << "*** " << flush ;
00297 
00298 //    if ( nLine > 42 ) {
00299 //      // close the input file
00300 //      infile.close() ;
00301 //      delete[] pcharFileName ;
00302 //      // return the status code
00303 //      return EXIT_SUCCESS ;
00304 //    }
00305 
00306     newState = GetXMLData( strLine, strElementName, strContent, 0, nParsePos, currentState ) ;
00307     switch ( newState ) {
00308       
00309       case DIRECTIVE :
00310         cout << "Found Directive = " << strContent << endl ; break ;
00311       
00312       case STARTING_COMMENT :
00313         cout << "Found Starting Comment" << endl ; break ;
00314       
00315       case IN_COMMENT :
00316         cout << "Found Comment Line" << endl ; break ;
00317       
00318       case ENDING_COMMENT :
00319         cout << "Found Ending Comment" << endl ; break ;
00320       
00321       case ONE_LINE_COMMENT :
00322         cout << "One-Line Comment Text = " << strContent << endl ; break ;
00323       
00324       case ELEMENT_OPENING_TAG :
00325         cout << "Element Opened = " << strElementName << endl ; 
00326         // ShowStack( vecElementNames ) ;
00327         if ( ptrElemCurrent == NULL ) {
00328           root.setNLineNo( nLine ) ;
00329           root.setStrTagName( strElementName ) ;
00330           ptrElemCurrent = &root ;
00331           // we are opening but not closing an element, so we need to push it on the stack
00332           vecElementStack.push_back( &root ) ;
00333         } else {
00334           Element* ptrElemNew = new Element( strElementName, nLine, strContent ) ;
00335           ptrElemCurrent->addChild( ptrElemNew ) ;
00336           ptrElemCurrent = ptrElemNew ;
00337           // we are opening but not closing an element, so we need to push it on the stack
00338           vecElementStack.push_back( ptrElemNew ) ;
00339         }
00340         ShowElementStack() ;
00341         break ;
00342       
00343       case ELEMENT_NAME_AND_CONTENT :
00344         cout << "Element Name = " << strElementName << endl ; 
00345         cout << "*** Element Content = " << strContent << endl ; 
00346         // if ( currentState == STARTING_DOCUMENT ) {
00347         if ( ptrElemCurrent == NULL ) {
00348           root.setNLineNo( nLine ) ;
00349           root.setStrTagName( strElementName ) ;
00350           root.setStrContent( strContent ) ;
00351           ptrElemCurrent = &root ;
00352         } else {
00353           Element* ptrElemNew = new Element( strElementName, nLine, strContent ) ;
00354           ptrElemCurrent->addChild( ptrElemNew ) ;
00355         }
00356         break ;
00357       
00358       case ELEMENT_CLOSING_TAG :
00359         cout << "Element Closed = " << strElementName << endl ; 
00360         // ShowStack( vecElementNames ) ;
00361         // remove the last element on the stack
00362         vecElementStack.pop_back() ;
00363         ShowElementStack() ;
00364         // reset the current element to be the last one on the stack
00365         // note that end() returns an iterator referring to the *past-the-end* element 
00366         //    in the vector, so we have to subtract 1 from this result
00367         ptrElemCurrent = *(vecElementStack.end()-1) ;
00368         break ;
00369       
00370       case ERROR :
00371         cout << "ERROR: " << strContent << endl ;
00372         return EXIT_FAILURE ;
00373 
00374       default :
00375         cout << "Unknown Line Read = " << strContent << endl ; break ;
00376     }
00377     currentState = newState ;
00378     
00379     cout << "*** New Parser State = " << GetParserState( newState ) << endl ;
00380 
00381         // if ( strElementName.compare( "release-list" ) == 0 ) break ;
00382   }
00383   
00384   // close the input file
00385   infile.close() ;
00386   delete[] pcharFileName ;
00387 
00388   // return the status code
00389   return EXIT_SUCCESS ;
00390 }
00391 
00397 void ShowChildData( Element& elem, int level ) {
00398   //  cout << "\nelem.getStrTagName = "  << elem.getStrTagName() << endl ;
00399   //  cout << "elem.getVecChildren().size() = "  << elem.getVecChildren().size() << endl ;
00400   for ( int k = 0 ; k < elem.getVecChildren().size() ; k++ ) {
00401     Element* ptrChildElement = elem.getVecChildren().at( k ) ;
00402     cout << "\n  Child tag name = " << ptrChildElement->getStrTagName() << endl ;
00403     cout << "    Child line # = " << ptrChildElement->getNLineNo() << endl ;
00404     cout << "     Child level = " << level << endl ;
00405     cout << "   Child content = " << 
00406         ( ptrChildElement->getStrContent().length() == 0 ? 
00407             "(empty)" : ptrChildElement->getStrContent() ) << endl ;
00408     cout << "Child N children = " << ptrChildElement->getVecChildren().size() << endl ;
00409     if ( ptrChildElement->getVecChildren().size() != 0 ) {
00410       ShowChildData( *ptrChildElement, level + 1 ) ;
00411     }
00412   }
00413 }
00414 
00415 
00421 void ShowXMLTree( Element& elem, int level ) {
00422   
00423   // indent appropriately
00424   for (int k = 0 ; k < level ; k++ ) {
00425     cout << ". " ;
00426   }
00427   
00428   // display data for the current element
00429   cout << elem.toString() << endl ;
00430   
00431   // process the element's children
00432   for ( int k = 0 ; k < elem.getVecChildren().size() ; k++ ) {
00433     ShowXMLTree( *(elem.getVecChildren().at( k )), level + 1 ) ;
00434   }
00435 }

00445 int ReadMusicLibrary_v2_1( string strFileName ) {
00446   
00447   GetXMLData( strFileName ) ;
00448   
00449   cout << "\n============================================================" << endl ;
00450   
00451   cout << "\n   Root tag name = " << root.getStrTagName() << endl ;
00452   cout << "     Root line # = " << root.getNLineNo() << endl ;
00453   cout << "      Root level = 0" << endl ;
00454   cout << "    Root content = " << 
00455       ( root.getStrContent().length() == 0 ? 
00456           "(empty)" : root.getStrContent() ) << endl ;
00457   cout << " Root N children = " << root.getVecChildren().size() << endl ;
00458   
00459   // show the data for all the children of the root
00460   if ( root.getVecChildren().size() != 0 ) {
00461     ShowChildData( root, 1 ) ;
00462   }
00463   
00464   cout << "\n============================================================\n" << endl ;
00465   
00466   // show the XML tree as required by Assignment No. 2
00467   ShowXMLTree( root, 0 ) ;
00468   
00469   // return the status code
00470   return EXIT_SUCCESS ;
00471 }
